name: Book Already Exists by name

testSteps.description: 1: Book Already Exists by name ({id=11, user_role=admin, author=James John})

children.description: Given I am a admin user
And a book with ID 2, title "Secret Book" and author "Jane Doe" already exists

restQuery.responseHeaders:

Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Tue, 07 Jan 2025 04:55:06 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60

children.description: Then the response status code should be 208
And the response should contain the error message "Book Already Exists"

title: Book Already Exists by name

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I am a <user_role> user
And a book with ID 2, title "Secret Book" and author "Jane Doe" already exists
When I send a POST request to create a book with ID <id>, title "Secret Book" and author "<author>"
Then the response status code should be 208
And the response should contain the error message "Book Already Exists"
